text:
Kami agak kecewa dgn pelayanan front office inisial B dan J. pada saat check in, yg melayani bagian FO inisial B, dan saat checkout dilayani oleh inisial J.
'salah satu'nya soal pelayanan minta 2 kunci akses, krn lift d hotel harus pakai akses. Utk dapat 2 kunci akses, wajib deposit 100rb, tp saat saya checkout dan kasih 2 kunci si FO diem aja ga dperiksa atau tanya apakah ada deposit. Saya hampir kelupaan klo naro deposit, karena d hotel lain biasanya ga pake deposit klo cm mnt 2 pcs akses. Kita iseng tanya jg klo bukti deposit hilang gmn? FO inisial J menjawab dgn sinis y jgn sampe hilang buktinya. Harusnya bs memberikan jawaban yg ramah dgn bilang kita punya salinan tanda terimanya kak, dsb. Dan juga namanya kita kasih 2 kunci harusnya sudah otomatis dong FOnya paham bahwa customer pst punya deposit. Ini kalo saya bner" lupa, deposit saya ilang gt aja dong???

Tolong FO terkait lebih dilatih lg, karena peran FO sangat penting untuk memberikan kesan pertama & terkahir yg bagus, tp malah disambut & diakhiri dgn kesan yg krg bagus dr tim FOnya.

Untuk staf resto, security, dan housekeeping semuanya sangat ramah & cepat tanggap dlm memenuhi masukan & komplain pelanggan. Terutama staf F&B inisial F, ramah bangeeeettt & mingle dgn tamu 👍👍
Dia jg yg nanyain k kita gmn di kamar, apakah ada problem dsb, padahal dia staf resto.
Staf FOnya ga ada sama sekali tu peduli soal ecperience tamu 😑

owner_response.text:
Dear meitarestu,

Salam Hangat dari Golden Tulip Essential Belitung...
Terimakasih telah menginap di Golden Tulip Essential Belitung dan meluangkan waktu anda yang berharga untuk menulis review mengenai hotel kami.

Kami sangat senang bahwa anda memilih Golden Tulip Essential Belitung untuk menikmati waktu liburan anda di Belitung, lokasi kami berada di area Tanjung Pendam yang merupakan obyek wisata baik bagi turis lokal maupun luar, di sekitar hotel juga tersedia berbagai macam tempat hiburan, kafe maupun resto dan bisa dijangkau dengan berjalan kaki, apabila dirasa cukup jauh kami juga menyediakan sepeda sehingga kegiatan liburan anda akan terasa berbeda dan pasti menyenagkan.

Review anda merupakan penghargaan bagi seluruh staff kami yang senantiasa memberikan pelayanan terbaik kepada tamu kami sehingga akan mendapatkan pengalaman pelanggan yang luar biasa .

Dengan sukacita kami menunggu kedatangan anda kembali di Golden Tulip Essential Belitung.  

Best Regards, 
Dodi Priyonardo 
General Manager

text:
Dari pelataran hotel menuju ke pantai Tanjung Pendam dapat ditempuh dengan berjalan kaki tidak lebih dari 10 menit saja. 

Suasana lobi hotel sangat nyaman karena disediakan begitu banyak sofa untuk kita duduk bersantai menikmati sore, malam, maupun pagi. 

Suasana kamar juga ok, penerangan kamar sangat nyaman untuk mata, terang tapi tidak menyilaukan. 

Tersedia minibar kosong di dalam kamar dengan pintu kulkas transparan dan diterangi lampu redup berwarna biru yang bisa dijadikan penerangan temaram saat kita tidur. 

Koneksi internet via wifi di dalam kamar kualitasnya cukup baik dengan kecepatan yang tidak mengecewakan, cukup cepat bahkan untuk menikmati streaming youtube sekalipun. 

Untuk menu sarapan pagi menurut saya biasa-biasa saja tidak ada yang istimewa meskipun juga tidak mengecewakan. 

Overall ok lah menurut saya.
title: Berada sangat dekat dengan pantai Tanjung Pendam

text:
Perjalanan dinasku kali ini luar biasa, karena akhirnya saya harus menginjakkan kaki di Belitung, Pulau Laskar Pelangi. Kebetulan kita baru selesai kerjaan di Belitung Timur agak malam, jadi perlu tempat istirahat yang nyaman. Golden Tulip Essential Hotel terletak di pusat kota Tanjung Pandan,l dan hanya berjarak 50 meter dari Pantai Tanjung Pendam. Kebetulannya lagi, pas dapat kamar Grand Deluxe dengan balkon view pantai, mantap Gan...😎. Dengan balkon dan kursi santai, kamu bisa menikmati angin dan pemandangan pantai baik siang dan malam. Bonusnya lagi, pagi hari saya disambut dengan penampakan Pelangi dari Balkon. Oke, sorry saya terlalu bersemangat, intinya hotel ini memiliki keunggulan :
1. Dekat kota, Dekat Pantai
2. Dekat tempat nongki nongki anak muda gaul dengan menu khas dan special seperti Nasi goreng Kampoeng Belitong.
3. Kalau ingin mendapatkan view laut, pastikan memilih kamar deretan 315.
4. Bisa sewa mobil tanpa supir, harga negotiable.
5. Menu breakfast sangat variatif
6. Suasana lobby sangat nyaman
7. Luasan kamar dan interior juga nyaman untuk beristirahat dan bekerja (ada work table view laut)
8. sisanya cobain sendiri ya...😀
title: Buang Penatmu di Sini!!

text: Tanggal 1-4 Oktober 2015, pertama kali saya datang ke Belitung, saya sudah pesan kamar di Golden Tulip Hotel sejak 2 minggu sebelumnya lewat staff reservasi nya (Ibu Eka) dan saya order untuk penjemputan di bandara lengkap dgn jadual penerbangan saya. Saat saya tiba di bandara, tidak ada pihak hotel yg menjemput saya sampai 45 menit dengan alasan ada salah komunikasi di internal mereka. Sangat kelewatan. Dan sopir yang jemput saya seperti tidak biasa bawa mobil karena cara menyetir nya bikin pusing kepala, lalu saat di jalan ada razia polisi, mobil kami diberhentikan. Lalu sopir saya turun dan bicara pada pak polisi, bahwa sopirnya tersebut tidak punya SIM ataupun STNK karena sebelumnya sang sopir bawa mobil hotel yang pajaknya mati. Sungguh terlalu !! Saat saya sampai hotel, hanya ada ibu Eka reservasi yang datang minta maaf. Lalu saat saya masuk kamar, kamarnya cukup besar dan perabotan masih baru. Namun saat 2 jam di kamar, ac tidak kunjung dingin, dan saat saya mau telepon ke pihak hotel, telepon di kamar mati. Akhirnya saya telepon pakai hp saya ke nomer hotel, akhirnya datang engineering AC dan telepon, namun hanya diganti pesawat telepon dan tetap tidak berfungsi, dan AC hanya dibuka lalu ditutup kembali (photos attached). Lalu dia berkata akan mau dicek kembali ke bagian IT. Sampai 1 jam lebih engineering tidak kembali dan saya ditelantarkan krn AC tidak dingin dan telepon kamar mati. Saya telepon ke hotel lagi sampe 2x tapi tidak ada response. Akhirnya saya turun ke front office, baru staff FO yang bilang bahwa akan diberikan kamar yang baru. Setelah saya ditelantarkan sampai 1 jam lebih dan saya yang turun ke bawah, baru dia menjelaskan???????!!!!!! Saya minta ketemu dgn GM Hotel Bp. Tonny Fernandez untuk masalah saya, tapi tidak ada 1 pun yang datang menemui saya untuk permintaan maaf. Dan juga, masih sangat terdengar suara tukang yang bekerja karena sepertinya hotel ini belum siap untuk beroperasi. Namun pada saat saya check out, saya ditemui (karena saya yang minta juga) oleh Manager on Duty (saya lupa namanya), tapi untuk seorang Manager on Duty di bidang hospitality, grooming nya sangat tidak pantas, baju tidak rapih dan tato di tangan nya sangat tidak sopan untuk di hotel yang katanya international chain. Cara berbicara nya juga tidak mencerminkan hotelier. Well,, thank you so much Golden Tulip Belitung for your BAD SERVICES and gave me BAD memories during our stayed at Belitung island !!!
title: poor service!!!

text:
The positive things about this hotel :

1. The STAFF who are all very polite and try to accommodate you with a smile. They are keen to help, and honest too.
On the day we checked out, 15 minutes to our drive the hotel called me on the mobile to inform that we have left a watch in the bathroom. The management should receive our thank you for this.

2. the location is great, being at the 'beginning' of the seafront street it only takes 30 minutes to reach from the airport. You can walk to centre of town, thus to kongdjie coffee , Timpo Duluk resto, etc. If you choose to take online taxi going here and there is only some 10 minutes drive.

3. The beds are good, The linen also fresh and clean. 
4. There is a water cooker in the room to make your own tea

Things they need to improve :

(1) The towels in the rooms are now really really old and grey. They need to be urgently replaced. 
(2) Breakfast quality
(3) Some rooms get the noise / music from the cafe downstairs and on Sat nights the music plays on high volume till mindnight.
(4) the wifi connection is rather poor
(5) the tv connections is also poor
title: Keen and honest staff

text:
I  think  this  hotel is  a  verrrrrry  nice  hotels  considering  that  it is  situated  in  an island  like  Belitung.  We Stayed 4 days  3 nights during  peak  season.  

It is  definitely  not  a 5 star  hotels, but Toileteries, towels, fridge, safe deposit box and  hairdryers  were  all  available  in  the  room.  

We like  the  spacious  living  room provided on each  floor, you  can  see  it  once  the  lift-door  opened.  

Breakfast   was  mainly  local  dishes  but  hotels  also  prepared  cereals, some  desserts and  choices  of  eggs (omelettes, scrambled, poached)  although  not  in many  varieties. Fresh  fruits, juices, tea, coffee  are  all  there, it's basic. But  I  think  it's  superb.  Considering  that   Belitung is  quite  a  less  developed  place. 

I bought  snacks in  hotel  shops  for   my  son: instant noodles, garlic stick and  potato chips. The  prices  are  very  very   reasonable.  It's amazingly  priced  at 1/4th  of  those sold  in  Bali's hotel.  We  are  not  pricely  hijacked.

Staffs  are   generally   helpful  and  friendly.  We  loved  the  welcome  drinks  at  the   lobby, especially  after   returning from those tour  on  a  hot   day.

text:
Came here over the new years break, booked and paid for the rooms 2 months in advance. We had booked a total of 5 rooms.

When we got in the rooms it was so humid, the bathrooms was dirty, no possibility to open windows to have some fresh air from outside. My aunt even found a dirty underwear in the cupboard.

We asked for new rooms and guess what, they were fully booked and it was their last rooms available. After complaining some more they managed to change the worst 2 rooms. 

The hotel itself is new, but it very very humid. The pillows smell humidity too. There are bed bugs biting you all over, you keep scratching yourself when you wake up.

The staff is fairly young and adorable, always smiling and here to help, i guess they have no experience at all. 

Once we tried the hotel restaurant for dinner, we were the only one there. 79 rooms in the hotel and no customers - that is strange. Not knowing where else to go we decided to give it a try. It was 7 pm.
Oh god, what a bad idea.
We brought some wine along not being sure they had any. 
They sell beer that's it. However they have a cork fee. Why do you have a cork fee if you don't sell any wine? (After negotiating and explaining them the logic behind it, they did not charge us). If you are planning on drinking here bring your own, you will not find any alcoholic shop on the island.

We ordered food, for 10 people.
Food came one by one. Pasta first, then club sandwich, then Indonesian food, then pasta again then cordon bleu etc... You get it, absolutely no organization in the kitchen. 
The steaks were boiled, uncuttable/ unchewable either. 

The worst was the burger... It was the last meal to come from the kitchen. It was served 1hour 30 minutes after ordering... We ordered 3 and they brought 2. They apologized and said sorry the fries are not ready you will have to wait another 10 min. To top it off, the steak inside was still frozen. 

After multiple complaints, the manager on duty told us his chef was not working tonight and it was only sous chef in the kitchen. He then told us if we wanted to have better food, we should have gone to the hotel nearby where the food is better. 

Thank you for giving us this info - after our meal.

On top of that, be careful if you have a kid, as there is a gap between the corridor and window on 2nd floor. The space is big enough for a child to fall off and end up on 1st floor.

On my next trip to the island, I will listen to the manager's advice, try another hotel nearby.
title: Hotel standard inexistent

text: I came here with my family for holiday and to spend new year's eve, we already booked and paid more less 1month before we arrived. Unfortunately when we arrived they gave us 2 rooms in 2nd floor and 4 rooms in 1st floor, the rooms in 2nd floor was good but what they gave us on 1st floor is soooooo smelly, 3 out of 4 rooms that they gave us actually, its smells super humid! i tried to ask them to change our room especially what we have on the 1st floor. After i was waiting for about 2hrs,  me and golden tulip PR can managed it! On the 3rd day of our stay , we were all had dinner in their restaurant called Branche. Some of our food already came but some of them wasnt come out until we were waiting 1,5hr. When it came, the burger buns and the meat was freaking cold. Another steak we asked it "medium rare" turns out it came without what we asked. But luckily the changed it and it tastes better like what we wanted. But the other food wasn't good. We were trying to go to the kitchen to talk to their chef but the manager grab my boyfriend's tshirt and said "u cant come here. Its not allowed" in a high tone. At the moment, its so awkward and the manager looks like punching my boyfriend. But after a while, the other member of our family try to talk nicely to the manager and pull him outside, its all clear and he said he has no Chef! Well, why  he didnt said it since before. And my impression with the services of this hotel was awful! I think if its just short stay like 1-2days without family, this hotel is ok. But to stay with your whole family, it isnt a good idea to stay here.
title: Such a bad services

text:
we stayed in Golden Tulip Essential Belitung on June 12 to June 14 2016. The hotel located 3 minutes walking from the beach whereas a perfect place to catch a sunset, not a swimmable beach though. There's a cafe nearby, an a traditional shop that sells soap, drinks, sandals, etc, and the famous Kong Djie coffee stall within 10 minutes walking. 
The room itself is clean, the AC working good, be careful for the door as it not always close down completely, the hot water pressure is not stable and the water smells like iron. We got a room on 2nd floor that overlook the beach but still we can't catch the sunset due to the high palm tress that block the view.
Breakfast is standard, egg corner, rice porridge, limited varieties of salad, glutinous rice porridge, some cereal, fried rice and several more.
They offer bike rental for as low as Rp. 10k/hour for a minimum 2 hours. 
The front desk needs improvement as they gave us a key to other people room that still occupied. Luckily no one inside the room, just their stuff.

text:
This is a great, clean, new hotel,with very good service. Everyone who worked there tried hard to make things good for us. Unfortunately we didn't realise this Golden Tulip hotel had no pool in Jan 2016.. And the beach, just a few minutes' walk away is beautiful, but  signs in Bahasa warn that it is dangerous. (Quicksand apparently). The nearest beach where you can swim is Tanjung Tinggi, 30 km north but it gets rather crowded on Sundays!. Go there with StreeTaxi, they are very reliable. Also don't miss the island hopping. 
The hotel lets out bikes for 20,000 Rupiah for two hours, which is great value. 
The family room was large, clean and comfortable, but difficult to dry wet things. You can hear roosters crowing in the morning. The TV mainly showed Bahasa and Chinese programming. No news but only sport in English. Wifi was not working much when we were there. The restaurant food is good and there are lots of cafes  nearby.
title: Lovely hotel, but beware of  the beach! You can cycle though.

title: Big room, clean and full concept hotel

text:
Just leaving Belitung yesterday.

Positive comment for this hotel :
1. New hotel with the bedding & new equipment
2. Family room space very big & comfortable
3. Breakfast very delicious and have various type of food
4. Wifi very speed
5. Branche restaurant foods is very delicious recomended food is The pizza.
6. in the midtown very near to Tanjung Pendam beach
7. They provide Car rent, Motor rent, & tour also

Negative comment for this hotel :
1. the room that we are assigned, key is not working so we are moved to other room in the 3rd floor, with condition the Elevator was under maintainance. So we were going up with Our luggage by the stairs.
2. in 2nd day Our room is not make up by house keeper, when we are contact to front desk they have miscommunication between front desk with house keeper. So when we are moving to other room in our 1st night, They are not update in system that they moved our room up..? How come..? 
3. when we are calling to front desk in the night they are not picked up the phone. But when we went to front desk they have in duty PIC. ( so it's mean they were not ready to serve the guest in hotel 24hr)

But overall if the service maintaince very well & good by the Hotel.This hotel will very recomended hotel. with this kind of service maybe this hotel just so so hotel if compare with other hotel chain in belitung.
title: New Hotel in Belitung

text:
L'hôtel vient d'ouvrir, l'accueil est très chaleureux, personnel attentif et très professionnel. Les chambres sont spacieuses. le petit déjeuner inclus est copieux et diversifié. Le restaurant de l'hôtel est très agréable, super plats à prix raisonnables.
L'hôtel est très bien situé, dans le centre, à deux pas de la plage. Incontournable à Belitung!
